page.title: 17MADGINFORD ESTATE FAMILIES
page.content: Over 200 children at Madginford Park School (790547) class their homes as: {Detached-35.6%, Semi-detached - 48.2% {Terraced-10.5%, Detached bungalow-2.8% {Semi-detached bungalow-2.8% Fathers' employment includes: {Building-associated industries-11.7%, {Service industries-11.3%, {Motor industry-10.4%, Managers-10.4%, {Police-9.5%, Shops-9.0%, {Business/Insurance-5.8%,Chemicals-5.4% {Teachers-4.5%, Computers-4.1% Of mothers, 60% are described as housewives, 26% as secretaries. Average family size is 2.25 children. {Only child-10.34%, 2 children-68.48%, {3 children-9.85%, 4 children-9.35%, {5 children-1.48%, 6 children-0.49%. Children attend for leisure purposes: Swimming clubs-32.4%,Scouts etc.-25.9% Tennis-9.0%,Dancing-7.5%,Riding-7.2%, Judo-4.7%, Sunday School-3.6%.
